name: Drifter (itch) (lucaszilke)
description:
Recommendations:

- Use the Screen Resolution provided due to the Post Process dithering - feel free to try full screen but artifacts may appear.

-  Turn on Audio for Voice Overs.

- Use Mozilla Firefox as Browser.
---------------------------------------------------------
Warning! The game features Elements of Horror.
---------------------------------------------------------

Drifter is a horror-clicker game set in space.

You play as Paul, a Harvester tasked with gathering a vital energy resource for humanity's further colonization of Space.

As you progress through the game, you'll uncover the secrets of the energy resource and the true nature of the Oort Cloud. The stakes are high, and the dangers are real - will you have what it takes?

The game is designed as a clicker, so you have to click your way through the game to gather resources.

Controls:

Interact : LMR/RMB Button
